attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VAT was meant to be for luxury goods and whilst I appreciate that owning a pet is a privilege I totally disagree with having to VAT on vets bills.

If an animal is poorly then it is a neccesity to try and make them better as soon as possible. By adding VAT on top of already high bills I feel the government is suggesting that owning a healthy animal is a luxury!!

Please could you consider removing or reducing the amount of VAT on all essential veterinary treatment.

Thank you
